segments.text: The boy is standing on a wobbly stool, trying to reach the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I see him stretching his arm as far as he can to grab a cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool looks like it's about to tip over, but he doesn't seem to care.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His sister is standing nearby, waiting for him to share a cookie with her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think they are being really sneaky, taking cookies without asking.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman drying dishes has no idea what they're up to.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if they will get away with it or if she will catch them.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool is really unstable, and I'm worried he might fall.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I notice the open cabinet doors framing the boy as he reaches for the jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope he doesn't fall and hurt himself.
segments.speaker: PAR
